clusterList.phrase: congratulations you survived your first biopsy
why wasn't my cancer caught earlier
it caused me to refocus my priorities and on 1 june 2002 one year earlier than i had planned i retired
my mom died when i was one year old when i was three years old i made my dad so angry he died i grew up crawling around in the forest eating twigs
it was cancer and i had eight months to live
i had eight months in a miracle i got the liver out in seven
and little by little i got worse i had cirrhosis and i was on a transplant list by the time i got to dallas i was already at the top of the list i was really really bad
